official_title: A bill to remove the limitation on the maximum rate of interest which may be paid on certain balances maintained in a negotiable order of withdrawal account.

summary.text: Prohibits Federal regulation of the rate of interest which may be paid on balances in excess of $5,000 which are maintained in a negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) account.

titles.title: A bill to remove the limitation on the maximum rate of interest which may be paid on certain balances maintained in a negotiable order of withdrawal account.
